entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
